TextBlock.Text: DEUTZIA: Now that everything is done here, I am leaving <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>.

DEUTZIA: I was planning to use the white hole core from this warp pad to power <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>'s warp core, but unfortunately it has been broken from exposure to <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>.

DEUTZIA: I will put this broken warp core in the storage area on top of the <color=orange>Library</color>, along with the white hole core that was too large to be used for this warp reciever (or <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>'s warp core).
